author: Kelsie Gibson
title: Kate Hudson Shakes What Her Momma Gave Her in an Impressive Dance Video
text:
Kate Hudson Dance Video on Instagram February 2017 Kate Hudson Shakes What Her Momma Gave Her in an Impressive Dance Video February 11, 2017 A video posted by Kate Hudson (@katehudson) on Feb 10, 2017 at 2:29pm PST 
If you got it, flaunt it. On Friday, Kate Hudson kicked off the weekend by showing off her impressive dance moves on Instagram. "Coming into the weekend with @nicolewinhoffer like....ðŸ’ƒ," she captioned the cute clip of her working out in her Fabletics gear. Not only is she perfectly in sync as she works out the choreography, but she also flaunts her killer figure as she twerks for the camera. Get it, girl! Related:
